sourcesContent:
<script>
import Home from './views/Home.vue';
import List from './views/List.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    Home,
    List,
  },

}
</script>
<template>

  <router-view >
            <router-link to="/List">Projects</router-link>
            <router-link to="/">About</router-link>

    </router-view>
</template>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: baseline;
  color: #2c3e50;
  height: 100%;

}
body {
  margin:0;

}
nav {
  position: absolute;
  display:flex;
  z-index:3;
  width:100%;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  align-items:flex-end;
  height: 80px;
  font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
}

nav a {
  color: #FFFFFF;
  font-weight: 200;
  height: 100%;
  width:60px;
  align-items: flex-end;
  position: relative;
  display:flex;
  padding:20px;
  padding-right: 0;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: center;
  transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #FFFFFF;
  font-weight: 200;
  height: 100%;
  width:60px;
  border-bottom: 6px solid #FFFFFF;
  background-color: #42b983;
  align-items: flex-end;
  position: relative;
  display:flex;
  padding:20px;
}
nav a:hover {
  border-bottom: 6px solid #FFFFFF;
  color: #FFFFFF;
  font-weight: 200;
  height: 100%;
  width:80px;
  background-color: #42b983;
  align-items: flex-end;
  position: relative;
  display:flex;
  padding:20px;
}
</style>
